input_text:
TECH CAREER FAIR 2025
Connect with Top Technology Employers!

📅 Saturday, May 10, 2025 | 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
📍 City Convention Center, Hall A & B
   123 Convention Way, Austin, TX 78701

FEATURED COMPANIES:
Google • Microsoft • Amazon • Apple • Tesla • Meta • IBM • Oracle • + 50 more!

SCHEDULE:
10:00 AM - Doors Open & Registration
10:30 AM - Welcome Presentation (Main Stage)
11:00 AM - Company Booths Open / Resume Reviews
12:30 PM - Panel: "Breaking Into Tech" (Room 201)
2:00 PM - Workshop: "Ace Your Technical Interview" (Room 202)
3:30 PM - Raffle Drawing (Main Stage)

REGISTRATION: FREE but required
Sign up at: www.techcareerfair.com/register
Early bird deadline: April 25th (free t-shirt!)

Parking: Convention Center Garage ($10 all-day)

QUESTIONS?
Email: info@techcareerfair.com
Call: (512) 555-JOBS

Organized by Austin Tech Alliance & Career Services

expected_json.description: Career fair connecting job seekers with top technology employers including Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Apple, Tesla, Meta, IBM, Oracle, and 50+ more companies
